attributes.action: Leave the EU on 12th April 2019 - AS WE DEMOCRATICALLY VOTED FOR IN 2016.
attributes.additional_details: By signing the current 'LEAVE' petition on this Government Website, it calls for the UK to leave the EU on 29th March 2019. Due to a Governmental and a general Political unwillingness to accept the Referendum result of 2016, by the majority of M.P.s, both here in the UK and by M.E.P.s in the EU, this unfortunately won't now happen. PLEASE SIGN THIS NEW PETITION TO RECTIFY THE DATE ANOMALY, which unfortunately, has now been moved to 12th April 2019.
attributes.background: The current 'LEAVE' petition, on this Government Website calls for the UK to leave the EU on 29th March 2019. Due to a Governmental and Political unwillingness here in the UK and in the EU this won't now happen. PLEASE SIGN THIS NEW PETITION TO RECTIFY THE DATE ANOMALY, which is now 12th April 2019.
